document_data.name: Zenith Feur'sel
document_data.mainbody: '''Zenith Feur'sel''' was a member of the [[Greycloaks]] of [[Evereska]] who ventured out from his home city in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He had light skin, a prominent chin, and wavy chestnut hair.
document_data.Abilities: In his studies as a [[cleric]], Zenith chose to focus on the [[light domain]] of [[divine magic]].
document_data.History: After serving with his fellow Greycloaks of Evereska, Zenith's wanderlust saw him leave his home city and travel the breadth of [[Faer√ªn]]. His journey was ultimately cut short however in in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}. He was killed by a group of raiders aligned with the [[cult of the Absolute|cultist of the Absolute]]. Zenith was among the dozen individuals chosen by the entity [[Withers]] to aid in his campaign against the [[Dead Three]]. It may be implied that Zenith was the son of another elven Greycloak of Evereska, [[Xan]], having his father noted as being a dour mannered man who (rightfully) claimed that Zenith was 'doomed'.
